comments.body: This is only used in the `fieldmanager` package, can it be put into `internal`?

Putting this in internal means we couldn't construct a fieldmanager from outside of this package. Also I'm not sure if, being in internal, we would be allowed to implement the interface Manager, since it's functions take some interfaces defined in this package as arguments. This Manager is mostly just a wrapper for internal.BuildManagerIdentifier anyway, so most of the logic is internal
